text: Axinaea pauciflora is a species of plant in the family Melastomataceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. The specific epithet pauciflora is Latin for 'few- flowered'.Allen J. Coombes D. Gledhill ==References== Category:Flora of Ecuador pauciflora Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
